revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [recto] . . . ; To Theophilos the just . . .; . . . ; to Demetrios, of wheat . . .; [l. 5] to Dorion, of wheat . . .; to Philokrates,of wheat . . .; to the water-carrier Philemon . . .; delivering, of barley . . .; to Deios Syriakos, of wheat . . .; [l. 10] to Dionysios the soldier, of wheat . . .; to Timaios, of wheat . . .; to Petimines, of wheat . . .; to Nikasippos, of wheat . . .; in the place cleared of weeds of . . .; [l. 15] to Kasepos, of wheat . . .; to Petesouchos . . .; to the baker . . . [verso] [col. I] the 6th, of wheat, 4; of barley, 1 1/2; [l. 20] the 7th, of wheat, 1 1/3; the 8th, of wheat, 8 1/2 1/3; the 9th, of barley, 2 1/2; the 10th, of wheat, 6; the 11th, of wheat, 2 1/2 1/3; [l. 25] the 12th, of wheat, 2 1/2 1/3; the 13th, of wheat, 5; the 14th, from the chaff of wheat; on the same day, 19 1/2; [l. 30] totals, of wheat 5; the 16th, from the chaff; . . . of wheat, 14 1/2; . . . of wheat, 1; of barley, 3; [l. 35] the 18th, of barley, 5; the 19th, of barley, 2; . . . [col. II] [l. 38] . . .; / totals, of wheat, 75 1/2; [l. 40] and from the chaff of wheat 1; of wheat mixed with barley from the chaff . . .; of barley, 2-; [vacat]; Pharmouthi; the 1st, of wheat, 4 1/2; [l. 45] the 9th, of wheat, 4 .; the 10th, of wheat, 5; the 11th, of wheat, 9 1/2; the 12th, of wheat, 1 1/2; the 13th, of wheat, 4; [l. 50] of barley, 1/2; the 14th, of wheat, 1 . . .; the 15th, of wheat, 2; the 16th, of wheat, 4; the 17th, of barley, 2.
